comment: I want to share one of my favourite song . I first heard this song when I was about years old & it's forever imprinted in my heart . Just watching the MV itself was both shocking & encouraging for the young me back then . <URL>

comment: I guess my depression already started though back then I wasn't really aware , thought that harming myself to feel better is normal / OK .
